characterDescription.skinTone: Fair skin with subtle rosy undertones, slightly pale complexion, particularly around the eyes.
characterDescription.eyeColor: Bright sky blue eyes with a slightly darker blue limbal ring and subtle grey undertones.
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, with visible upper eyelids and slightly puffy under-eye area.
characterDescription.hairColor: Dark chestnut brown hair with subtle auburn highlights in some strands, particularly around the face.
characterDescription.hairTexture: Wavy hair with a mix of loose curls and defined coils, medium density with some flyaways.
characterDescription.hairStyle: Hair styled in two high pigtail buns on top of the head, secured with pink hair clips adorned with white fluffy pom-poms. Some loose strands frame the face.
characterDescription.faceShape: Oval face with soft, rounded features, full cheeks, and a gentle jawline.
characterDescription.nose: Small, slightly button nose with a rounded tip and a subtle indentation at the bridge.
characterDescription.lips: Medium-full lips, naturally rosy pink, with a slightly more defined lower lip and a subtle Cupid's bow on the upper lip.
characterDescription.smile: Currently not smiling, but lips are slightly pursed, suggesting a potentially wide smile. Teeth not visible.
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thick eyebrows, slightly darker than hair color, with a gentle arch and a natural, slightly unkempt appearance.
characterDescription.ears: Medium-sized ears, set relatively close to the head.
characterDescription.cheeks: Full, rounded cheeks with a slight flush of natural rosiness.
characterDescription.chin: Softly rounded chin, proportionate to the face, without a prominent cleft.
characterDescription.facialProportions: Balanced facial proportions, with eyes being the most prominent feature relative to the size of the face. The nose is small relative to the other features.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Slightly puffy under-eye area. The light auburn highlights dispersed throughout the dark chestnut brown hair add dimension. Subtle indentation at the bridge of the nose.
characterDescription.overallImpression: Sweet and slightly serious appearance. The child has delicate features and a naturally rosy complexion, giving her a youthful, innocent look.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This is a 5-6 year old girl with fair skin that has rosy undertones. She has bright sky blue, almond shaped eyes which are slightly downturned at the outer corners and framed by medium-thick, dark chestnut brown hair. The girl's hair is styled in two high pigtail buns on top of her head with loose strands framing her face. Her facial features include a small, slightly button nose with a rounded tip, medium-full lips that are naturally rosy pink, and full, rounded cheeks with a slight flush of natural rosiness. Her overall look is completed by her softly rounded chin, giving her a sweet and slightly serious appearance.
